mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (category_name, parent_id, is_hidden, description, help, updated_at, updated_by, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{categoryName}, #{parentId}, #{isHidden}, #{description}, #{help}, now(), 'hikhjin', now(), 'hikhjin')
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET category_name = #{categoryFormDto.categoryName}, parent_id = #{categoryFormDto.parentId}, is_hidden = #{categoryFormDto.isHidden}, description = #{categoryFormDto.description}, help = #{categoryFormDto.help}, updated_at = now(), updated_by = 'hikhjin' WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM CATEGORY WHERE parent_id IS NULL
SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM CATEGORY WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}

SELECT 0 AS categoryId, '전체' AS categoryName, 0 AS depth, NULL AS parent_id, 0 AS display_order, NULL AS created_at, 0 AS tmp UNION ALL SELECT c.category_id, c.category_name, IF(c.parent_id IS NULL, 1, 2) AS depth, c.parent_id, c.display_order, c.created_at, IF(c.parent_id IS NULL, p.tmp, p2.tmp) AS tmp FROM CATEGORY c LEFT JOIN ( -- 부모 카테고리에 display_order 기준 tmp 부여 SELECT category_id, @r := @r + 1 AS tmp FROM CATEGORY, (SELECT @r := 0) r WHERE parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY display_order IS NULL ASC, display_order, created_at DESC ) p ON c.category_id = p.category_id LEFT JOIN ( -- 자식은 부모의 tmp 상속 SELECT child.category_id, parent.tmp FROM CATEGORY child JOIN ( SELECT category_id, @r2 := @r2 + 1 AS tmp FROM CATEGORY, (SELECT @r2 := 0) r2 WHERE parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY display_order IS NULL ASC, display_order, created_at DESC ) parent ON child.parent_id = parent.category_id ) p2 ON c.category_id = p2.category_id
ORDER BY tmp, depth, display_order IS NULL ASC, display_order, created_at DESC;

SELECT category_name AS categoryName, parent_id AS parentId, is_hidden AS isHidden, description, help, created_at AS createdAt, created_by AS createdBy, updated_at AS updatedAt, updated_by AS updatedBy FROM CATEGORY WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
